entry.title: Sunday: Near blizzard. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Near blizzard developing late this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 50 gusting to 70 late this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Near blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Near blizzard. Wind northeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming east 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 6.
